Generated Narrative: CodeSystem mars-devices-prototype-cs

Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

NameCodeURITypeDescription
deviceTypedeviceTypehttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/aerospace/CodeSystem/mars-devices-prototype-cs#deviceTypecodeDevice category
testEnvironmenttestEnvironmenthttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/aerospace/CodeSystem/mars-devices-prototype-cs#testEnvironmentcodePrimary test environment

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/aerospace/CodeSystem/mars-devices-prototype-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitiondeviceTypetestEnvironment
starship SpaceX StarshipFully reusable rocket/lander for Mars (prototype stage, orbital tests ongoing 2020s)spacecraftorbital-test
marsHabitat Mars Surface Habitat ModulePressurized living quarters for Mars surface (NASA DRA 5.0 concept, no full prototype yet)habitatanalog-mission
xemuMarsSuit xEMU Mars SuitNext-generation planetary EVA suit under development for lunar and Mars surface EVAssuitground
isruPlant Mars ISRU Propellant PlantScaled-up MOXIE + Sabatier system to produce CH4/O2 on Mars (tested at prototype level, MOXIE on Perseverance for O2)isru-systemmars-surface
kilopower Kilopower Fission Reactor10 kW nuclear fission surface power unit (prototyped on Earth 2018, KRUSTY demo, for future Mars use)power-generationground
pressurizedRover Pressurized Mars RoverConcept vehicle for long-range crew excursions (prototypes like NASA SEV exist but not Mars-certified)roverground
autonomousSurgicalUnit Autonomous Surgical UnitConcept medical device for Mars (lightweight operating table, robotic assist tools, TRL<6 prototype)medical-equipmentground

name: MarsPrototypeDevicesCS
title: Mars Mission Devices - Prototype
description: Developmental or conceptual hardware for Mars missions (prototypes, test articles, planned systems)

concept.definition: Fully reusable rocket/lander for Mars (prototype stage, orbital tests ongoing 2020s)
Pressurized living quarters for Mars surface (NASA DRA 5.0 concept, no full prototype yet)
Next-generation planetary EVA suit under development for lunar and Mars surface EVAs
Scaled-up MOXIE + Sabatier system to produce CH4/O2 on Mars (tested at prototype level, MOXIE on Perseverance for O2)
10 kW nuclear fission surface power unit (prototyped on Earth 2018, KRUSTY demo, for future Mars use)
Concept vehicle for long-range crew excursions (prototypes like NASA SEV exist but not Mars-certified)
Concept medical device for Mars (lightweight operating table, robotic assist tools, TRL<6 prototype)
